greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficients of polynomials related to the D'Arcais polynomials and Dedekind's eta(q) function, triangle read by rows, T(n,k) for 0 <= k <= n.
comment: Column k is the k-fold self-convolution of sigma (A000203). - _Alois P. Heinz_, Feb 01 2021
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..200, flattened
formula: The polynomials are defined by recurrence: p(0,x) = 1 and for n > 0 by
maple: P := proc(n, x) option remember; if n = 0 then 1 else
Trow := n -> seq(coeff(P(n, x), x, k), k=0..n):
seq(seq(T(n, k), k=0..n), n=0..10);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Feb 01 2021
mathematica: With[{q = Quotient[k, 2]}, Sum[T[j, q]*T[n-j, k-q], {j, 0, n}]]]];
Table[Table[T[n, k], {k, 0, n}], {n, 0, 10}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 11 2021, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Oct 03 2018
